explains: n. 营，军营；（有组织的）队伍

sentences.en: A U.S. infantry battalion was marching down the street.
sentences.cn: 一个美军步兵营沿着街道行进。

sentences.en: Ten hours later Anthony was ordered to return to his battalion.
sentences.cn: 10小时之后安东尼被命令回营。

sentences.en: At the left of this epaulement, there was visible the head of the column of a battalion.
sentences.cn: 在肩墙左侧，可以看到一军营前面几排的士兵。
